name: HighSchool LunchBox Maker
description:
Hello Kids!

It's time to back to school. Is your high school lunch food ready to take? 

Play Lunch Box maker games for kids that promote health and fitness. Choose the foods that has the necessary vitamins and health benefits.

here is a new cooking game in town , in which you can pack your own lunch box with the food items of your choice. Choose from a wide range of sandwiches, burgers, cupcakes, chocolates ,Donuts, French Fries, Fruits , favourite Drink and your favourite dessert items Create The Best Lunch Box and and get ready to eat have best Almuezro.


We call it the decorating the most delicious, loved, amazing, colourful lunch boxes for your schools, classrooms and share them among your class fellows.
We introduce you our new cooking game , it’s a High School Lunch Box Maker.Serve healthy balanced Food Box Meals today to your kids at school!.

With a little practice, you’ll be the ultimate Top Chef Jr. , Lunch Box Master and decorator!!

========
Features
========

-Garnish items including colourful lunch boxes
-Variety of burgers to decide and delight
-Eat your school lunch food with the best friends.
-Vast range of donuts and sweet desserts and sweet dishes
-Assemble lunch box for kids.
-Select your own lunch food.
-Decorate kinds of lunch food & Design the lunch box in your own style.
-Enjoy different fast food in this small box with favourite drink.
-Kitchen Cooking Simulation game for kids and girls and even for adults.

Start to make quick lunch for the school lunch box and have varieties of lunch idea for kids.

Download this for free! Have a nice day!
Your Suggestions are considered as part of our regular development process. You can send us your compliments/feedback on zero.gravity.7255@gmail.com
